net.kmf.service

Class PersonService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kmf.service.PersonService

  • @Path(value="/person")
public class PersonService
extends java.lang.Object
    The type Person service. kmf/api/person (everyone in the database) kmf/api/person/{id} (a single person with the id or an error message) kmf/api/person/story (3 random people put into a story)
    Author:
    jskarha 11/15/2017
